text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha tae chngaoy khnhom brab puok anak ampi brakear del la cheang brakear teangnoh ryyte? samreab banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh mean thansuokr now cheamuoy mcheasa robsa puokke del mean t ne l haur pi kraom vea daoy puokke now tinoh chea amt haey mean phriyea cheachraen del mean pheap saatasam promteang mean kar ylprom pi a l laoh . haey a l laoh mha kheunh nouv tongveu nei khnhom teangoasa( robsa trong)
